sources.title: The First | Full Movie | Intense Adventure Drama | Free Movie
sources.description:
Two young lieutenants of a Russian fleet set out along the Lena River to the Arctic Ocean during the summer of 1735. Tasked with reaching the most northeastern point of Eurasia and putting the vast Arctic territories on the world maps were their main purpose in life. Even when their crew is faced with deadly storms, severe northern frosts, and hunger, they remain determined to let nothing stop them. "The First" is an incredible story about loyalty, faith, and honor!

2018 | Stars: Nail Abdrakhmanov, Evgeniy Tkachuk, Alina Lanina

metadata.Plot: It is 1942, America has entered World War II, and sickly but determined Steve Rogers is frustrated at being rejected yet again for military service. Everything changes when Dr. Erskine recruits him for the secret Project Rebirth. Proving his extraordinary courage, wits and conscience, Rogers undergoes the experiment and his weak body is suddenly enhanced into the maximum human potential. When Dr. Erskine is then immediately assassinated by an agent of Nazi Germany's secret HYDRA research department (headed by Johann Schmidt, a.k.a. the Red Skull), Rogers is left as a unique man who is initially misused as a propaganda mascot; however, when his comrades need him, Rogers goes on a successful adventure that truly makes him Captain America, and his war against Schmidt begins.
metadata.Writer: Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely, Joe Simon
metadata.Actors: Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Samuel L. Jackson
